amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? SEC. ___. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used by the Government of the United States to enter into a basing rights agreement between the United States and Iraq.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being available to enter into a basing rights agreement between the United States and Iraq.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A050) offered by Ms. Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.
